title: How to use the chirp to program a Baofeng UV 5R - Quora

response.answer_text: I did it last week rather successfully. My aim was limiting the transceiver frequencies to the legal ones attributed to amateur radio in Spain: 144 - 146 Mhz and 430 MHz - 440 MHz. My advices: Buy or borrow a genuine programming cable, not a fake oneForget about the instructions of Baofeng, cryptic, not for everyoneHave a look to this video: Good luck!
Perhaps the best way is to visit a dedicated site as How to install the Baofeng USB programming cable and software
